title: Shortest Pages in the Last 30 Days
content:
[[include fragment:nav-generic-css]]
[[module CSS]]
.content-type-description .wiki-content-table td:nth-child(2) {
    width: 3.75rem;
    text-align: end;
    padding-inline: 0.625rem;
}
[[/module]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:earthworm
| first=false | last=false | hub=yes
| previous-url=/ | previous-title=Shortest Pages
| next-url=https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/top-rated-pages-this-month | next-title=Top Rated Pages
| hub-url=https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/new-pages-feed | hub-title=New Pages Feed
]]

[[=]]
Shortest pages in each category from the last 30 days.
[[size 80%]]**Occasionally, abnormally long pages may end up at the top of the list. If this occurs, please [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/contact-staff contact Staff].**[[/size]]
[[/=]]

[[div class="content-grid"]]

[!-- SCP Block --]

[[div class="content-box" id="scp"]]
[[div class="content-type-title"]]
Shortest SCPs
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-description"]]

[[module ListPages category="_default adult" rating=">10" tags="scp -tale -goi-format -admin -artwork -author -contest -creepypasta -essay -former-author -guide -hub -in-deletion -in-rewrite -news -orphaned -project -sandbox -site -splash -supplement -workbench -_listpages" order="size desc desc" separate="false" date="last 30 day" perPage="16" urlAttrPrefix="scp"]]
|| %%title_linked%% || (+%%rating%%) ||
[[/module]]

[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-footer"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[!-- Tale Block --]

[[div class="content-box tale" id="tale"]]
[[div class="content-type-title"]]
Shortest Tales
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-description"]]

[[module ListPages category="_default adult" rating=">10" tags="-scp tale -goi-format -admin -artwork -author -contest -essay -former-author -guide -hub -in-deletion -in-rewrite -news -orphaned -project -sandbox -site -splash -supplement -workbench -_listpages" order="size desc desc" separate="false" date="last 30 day" perPage="16" urlAttrPrefix="tale"]]
|| %%title_linked%% || (+%%rating%%) ||
[[/module]]

[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-footer"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]


[!-- GOI Block --]

[[div class="content-box goi" id="goi"]]
[[div class="content-type-title"]]
Shortest GOI-Formats
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-description"]]

[[module ListPages category="_default adult" rating=">10" tags="-scp -tale goi-format -admin -artwork -author -contest -creepypasta -essay -former-author -guide -hub -in-deletion -in-rewrite -news -orphaned -project -sandbox -site -splash -supplement -workbench -_listpages" order="size desc desc" separate="false" date="last 30 day" perPage="16" urlAttrPrefix="goi"]]
|| %%title_linked%% || (+%%rating%%) ||
[[/module]]

[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-footer"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[!-- Other Block --]

[[div class="content-box alt"]]
[[div class="content-type-title"]]
Shortest Other/Untagged Pages
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-description"]]

[[module ListPages category="_default adult" rating=">10" tags="-scp -tale -goi-format -admin -in-deletion -in-rewrite -orphaned -project -sandbox -site -splash -supplement -workbench -_listpages" order="size desc desc" separate="false" date="last 30 day" perPage="16" urlAttrPrefix="other"]]
|| %%title_linked%% || (+%%rating%%) ||
[[/module]]

[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-footer"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

+ Archive

* [[[Shortest Pages By Month]]]
author: Yossipossi
